attributes.action: insist land developers make sigificant ring fenced financial contributions to improving local amenities, civic infrastructure and services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Often new or re-developments place an increased burden on local amenities, civic infrastructure and services.
The developer should contribute a percentage, say 10%, of their profits to the local authorities. This revenue will be ring fenced to provide capital improvements in the locality of the development.
